snippet: The investigation examined a violent confrontation between Afghan residents and United States soldiers after a Taliban bomb ripped through a heavily armored convoy of troops in Kabul.
abstract: Investigation by 11-person board of NATO officals into violent clash between American soldiers and citizens in Kabul, Afghanistan, finds American troops acted with considerable restraint, even after one of them was stabbed.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Ahmad Shakib.
